ygData.subject: Re: Bind Affinity
ygData.msgSnippet: if you bind someone, the only way they can undo it is bind elsewhere...and when you change your own bind point, that s where you go when  you die or gate (:
ygData.messageBody:
if you bind someone, the only way they can undo it is bind elsewhere...and when you change your own bind point, that's where you go when you die or gate (:

Alan Raboy wrote:

> From: "Alan Raboy" <ARaboy@...>
>
> I have a lvl 4.9 dwarven cleric on Brel and was wondering about the Bind afiinity spell as well as Gate. If I bind someone (once I get that spell), can they unbind themselves, or do they remain bound to the new location forever? Also, if I bind myself somewhere and then gate, where do I go, Butcherblock or my Bind Affinity location?
>
> Thanks!
